The Orchard Bar & Restaurant

The Best Live Music Venue in Bali

The Problem A newly formed band and the brain child of another highly talented artist who got his break at The Orchard

July 16, 2019July 16, 20191 minute readby Michael
Scroll this
129
SHARES
ShareTweet

The Problem is a newly formed band and the brain child of another highly talented artist who got his break at The Orchard. The Javanese born Rico Mahesi came and charmed The Orchard audience for the first time in May 2019 at our iconic Monday night jam. Since then Rico has gone from strength to strength and formed his own band, The Problem. 

Good friends of Rico’s, most of the band already knew each and the tightly formed gelling process began. A great mixture of funk, rock blues and pop and incredible falsetto vocals from Rico himself has seen these boys progress rapidly into the limelight and we’re delighted to see them on track for regular gigs, not just at The Orchard but in great music venues in Bali, Indonesia and soon touring across Asia Pacific. 

Tags: The Problem / Category: Artists

Location
